meanings.definition: The act of seeking refuge or safety.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, the havening of the cave provided shelter.
meanings.sent2: The havening of the lighthouse guided ships to safety.
meanings.sent3: The havening of the umbrella kept me dry in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The havening of the tree branches protected the birds from the wind.
meanings.sent5: The havening of the blanket wrapped me in warmth on the cold night.

meanings.definition: A place of safety or refuge.
meanings.sent1: The cozy cabin in the woods was a havening for the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The island was a havening for the endangered species.
meanings.sent3: The library became a havening for book lovers during the storm.
meanings.sent4: The garden shed served as a havening for the stray cat.
meanings.sent5: The park bench was a havening for tired joggers seeking rest.
